content.eamr: ( ing-0 "16 cups popped popcorn" )
( ing-1 "1 cup roasted peanuts" )
( ing-2 "1 cup brown sugar" )
( ing-3 "1/2 cup butter" )
( ing-4 "1/4 cup light corn syrup" )
( ing-5 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )
( ing-6 "1 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-7 "1/2 teaspoon baking soda" )
( ing-8 "1 cup milk chocolate chips" )
( ing-9 "1 teaspoon shortening" )

content.text: 1) Place popcorn and peanuts in a paper bag.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "popcorn"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "peanuts"@21:28 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "a paper bag"@32:43 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a microwave safe bowl, combine sugar, butter, corn syrup, vanilla and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@29:36 / AC
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a microwave safe bowl"@6:27 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@37:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "butter"@44:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "corn syrup"@52:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "vanilla"@64:71 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@76:80 / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Microwave"@3:12 / AC
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "4 minutes"@13:22 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until bubbly"@24:36 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Pour over popcorn mixture and shake bag to coat.
7) Roll down edges of bag and place bag in microwave.
8) Heat for 2 minutes, shaking three times to mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "2 minutes"@12:21 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "shaking"@23:30 / AC
		:duration ( dur-8-1 "three times"@31:42 / DUR )
		:prp ( purp-8-0 "to mix"@43:49 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Spread mixture onto prepared sheets to cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Spread"@4:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "mixture"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-9-0 "prepared sheets"@24:39 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-9-0 "to cool"@40:47 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 10) In a microwave safe bowl, combine chocolate and shortening.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "combine"@30:37 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "chocolate"@38:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "shortening"@52:62 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-10-0 "a microwave safe bowl"@7:28 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Microwave 90 seconds, stirring once, until melted.
